GOODSINFO_INFECTIONITEM: Cause disasters in one's own world
GOODSDESC_HOSTINGITEM:
A small, white eye orb. It feels slightly warm to the touch.

Looking directly into the eye fills one's soul with the thoughts
of jolly co-operation.
GOODSDESC_JOININGITEM:
A small, blue crystalline eye orb. It is emitting a faint
humming sound.

Looking directly into the eye fill one's soul with thoughts
of jolly co-operation.
GOODSDESC_BREAKINITEM:
A small, red hot eye orb. Who knows what evil deeds this
eye has witnessed.

Looking directly into the eye fill one's soul with the primal
desire for chaos.
GOODSDESC_LEAVINGITEM:
A small, black eye orb. The eye is looking directly into your soul.

Looking directly into the eye fill one's soul with
memories of home.
GOODSDESC_GAMERULECHANGEITEM:
A mess of unbound papers. The writing is faded.

The papers describe a ritual to invoke a person's true nature
amongst their allies.
GOODSDESC_INFECTIONITEM:
An old, scratched pendant of unknown use.

The origin of this pendant is unknown, but some sources describe
a missing pendant from the catacombs of Gravelord Nito.
GOODSDESC_CURSESIGILITEM:
A blood-red blossom growing around the darksign.

You can feel the roots of this plant directly feeding off you
MODMSG_GUESTSTART: Joining another world as a guest...
MODMSG_HOSTWARPOUT: The power of the homeward bone consumes you...
MODMSG_BREAKINSTART: Invading another world as an evil spirit
MODMSG_BREAKINSUCCESS: Invasion success! Returning to your world
MODMSG_BREAKINFAILED: Invasion failed... Returning to your world
MODMSG_BREAKINTIMEOUT: Failed to find session to invadee
